transcript.text: [Music]
hey guys this is destiny mos and I just
want to I haven't really done anything
with my patreon account itself you know
I just do the the videos on the video
sites but I wanted to upload this as a
thank you there's been a lot of support
lately a lot of new people are signing
up to help me continue with what I'm
doing here and I just want to say thank
you guys you guys are kind of my heros
you've made this thing possible and and
not only to allow me to to follow my
passion and to get news out there and to
engage with the enemy on the battlefield
of public influence which has always
been a dream of mine I never thought I
would actually be able to do it one day
but also to be a present father with my
baby I mean I'm always you know she's
always in the next room over and if she
needs me I can be there for so you guys
have really made a dream come true here
and I hope to be able to continue
earning your support through bringing
you value bringing you information that
you find useful educational trying to
help bring all of this stuff together
and make sense of it in this crazy world
that we're living in and I just wanted
to put this out there to express my
heartfelt gratitude and I really do
appreciate you guys thank you so much
and you know we're just getting warmed
up we have a long ways to go in this
fight and I also would like to request
you know feedback suggestions
constructive criticism you know you can
be blunt I don't care I'm not easy to
offend but just let me know what I'm
what I'm doing wrong what I could do
better and I appreciate it thank you
guys so much
